types.description: Questions submitted to Ask the Pastor feature

thirdPartyProcessing.dataSharing: For processing only, subject to OpenAI's privacy policy

types.description: Daily app usage, streak counters, verse preferences
Internal app identifier for user preferences

trackingPolicy.description: This app does not use data for tracking. No IDFA collection or cross-app tracking.

dataRetention.policy: Data is retained until user requests deletion or removes the app
dataRetention.userControl: Users can delete their data at any time through the Support page

childrensPrivacy.description: App is designed for users 13 years and older. No knowingly collecting data from children under 13.

appStoreMetadata.keywords: Bible, Gospel, Daily Devotional, Scripture, Christianity, Faith, Spiritual Growth, Prayer
appStoreMetadata.subtitle: Daily Bible verses and spiritual guidance
appStoreMetadata.description: Start each day with God's Word. The Gospel in 5 Minutes delivers daily Bible verses with meaningful explanations, AI-powered pastoral guidance, and 3-day study plans to deepen your faith journey.
appStoreMetadata.whatsNew:
• Beautiful nature-themed design with vivid imagery
• Enhanced daily streak tracking with consecutive day counter
• Improved privacy controls and data management
• Direct support access and feedback options
• Optimized for iOS performance and accessibility
